text: long sum ; int main ( ) { int counter , loop , test , val , i , j , k , m , n , num , arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , p , q ; long res , ans ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; for ( counter = 0 ; counter < test ; counter ++ ) { n = 0 ; sum = 0 ; res = 0 ; ans = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & val ) ; num = val ; for ( i = 0 ; i < val ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ j ] [ i ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < val ; i ++ ) sum += arr [ 0 ] [ i ] ; ans = sum ; for ( i = 0 , j = val - 1 ; i < j ; i ++ ) { sum = 0 ; for ( k = 0 ; k < j ; k ++ ) { sum += arr [ i ] [ k ] ; } while ( j < val ) { sum += arr [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; j ++ ; } if ( ans < sum ) ans = sum ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , ans ) ; } return 0 ; }
